body.name: PayLessHere 8 Inch Queen Gel Memory Foam Mattress Fiberglass Free/CertiPUR-US Certified/Bed-in-a-Box/Cool Sleep & Comfy Support
features: Professional packaging: our memory foam mattresses are compressed, rolled and packed in a box for easy installation; It's easy to get through the narrow corridors and stairs. They fit all frames such as springs, floors, slatted bases, slabs or adjustable beds, hospital beds. It is recommended to use a mattress for ventilation and shaping within 72 hours.

CertiPUR US Certification: The foam has been certified by CertiPUR US and is free of harmful substances such as formaldehyde, mercury and other heavy metals. The memory foam mattress provides comfort and support for a better night's sleep.

Layering: 8 inch mattress, 2 layers full foam system, mattress layer details: 6 "base support foam +2" gel memory foam. Foam mattresses are not too soft or strong for all sleeping positions. This medium firmness mattress is made of gel memory foam combined with comfy foam for the perfect top layer to support your weight and maintain your body shape for optimal rest.
Protective cover: durable, soft knit fabric cover with moisture absorption and sweat removal function helps to keep cool, surface protection technology helps to protect the mattress

High quality materials: Our memory sponge mattresses, combined with professional knowledge and the best materials, adopt advanced sleep technology. Gel memory foam helps with continuous airflow and air permeability; The surface of the mattress is made of skin-friendly fabric to improve breathing ability. The foam layer in the middle is designed as a airflow channel to increase airflow through all areas of the foam mattress.
body.description: Medium hard two layer cooling gel memory foam mattress Support and comfortable sleep The two-layer memory foam mattress provides a contour for the sleeper, helps to adjust the temperature, and promotes better sleep with head to foot comfort. Provide medium hard handle, 6 inch, 8 inch, 10 inch or 12 inch mattress height, twin bed, full bed, queen bed or king bed.There are many sizes to choose from. There is always one that you want.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Comfortable and breathable, you can sleep on it relaxed without worrying about too hot. The protective cover is zippered, which can save a lot of time and is very convenient. The surface is diamond shaped machine sewing thread, which is sturdy and durable. The mattress cover is machine washable and easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I rarely write a review on Amazon. But this bed is really great, and for such a great price. I waited until I had a full nights sleep on it to write this. The mattress is firm with the right amount of body conformity. Huge true to size I got the king size 8in and it’s perfect! Inflated to a full 8in top to bottom in less than 10hrs. I do not regret this purchase at all and definitely recommend you grab one if you were thinking about it.I seen some reviews talking about the ends of the mattress being flat. When I first removed it from the package the ends were also flat, it just needs enough time to fully expand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good night rest
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I purchased this mattress for our guest room bed and it’s amazing. All of our guest have loved it and they have commented how comfortable it is and how well they slept. I would recommend. The shipping was very fast as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Firm but comfortable
reviews.reviewText: It's more firm then I'm used to in a bed but it's definitely not uncomfortable, I'm 26 and my back usually hurts when waking up first thing in the morning but since having this bed that has stopped. I'm a tummy sleeper so I am guessing the firmness of the bed is helping with my spin not being all sort of curved at night.. my boyfriend and we're sharing a full sized bed since when we first got together and it was just to cramped and got tired of it after 3 1/2 years, I found this bed for a great price and took my chances. We havent slipped so good since when we first started dating there is so much room and so comfortable after getting adjusted to it. We've had it about a month and half now it's so hard to get out of bed in the morning for work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I agree that the mattress had a "chemically" scent to it when I took it out the box. It took a couple weeks before that smell was mildly noticable. Fit perfectly on my bed frame. I ordered the firm twin size. Paid extra for shipping, but that was okay. I bought this brand before and liked it. It is comfortable and I sleep very well on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is an absolutely great mattress… for those who don’t like super soft mattresses like me lol. It has a firmness to it but just a touch of memory foam feeling to it. I haven’t had any issues with it and would definitely buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bed was easy to put on my short king RV bed. That is very important to me because of my back. It came in as a semi soft hard bed. I’m used to softer ones and wasn’t sure if this would work for my back of many surgeries. Surprisingly enough I can actually lay on my back without pain. Not the most comfortable when I’m laying on my side. All in all it is a good product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased two of these 6 inch mattresses for my kids and they are perfect! Very comfortable and great price!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Best damn mattress I’ve had. Was delivered 5 days earlier than expected for 1. 2- the second I cut the wrap off it expanded fully in less then 10min. 3- got the 12” and it’s super thick love it and 4- I could cry rn I’ve been needing a mattress for 2 years now and I could finally get one and this mattress is soooo form and comfortable you can barely feel the movement of anyone else. It’s amazing just buy it!
